content: गलित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [गल्-क्त] {@--1@} Dropped or fallen down. {@--2@} Melted. {@--3@} Oozed, flowing. {@--4@} Lost, vanished, deprived. {@--5@} Untied, got loose. {@--6@} Emptied, leaked away. {@--7@} Filtered. {@--8@} Decayed, impaired. {@--9@} Decreased, exhausted; गलितविभवाश्चार्थिषु नृपाः <ls>Bh. 2. 44.</ls>
